name: Fruit Smasher Free
description:
“Totally the best through all the tap-splat type games )) I love the style ) keep up the good work!”
“Get this game no doubt about it!!”
“All my friends like it!!! And so do I!”

Smash fruits and vegs by taping or slicing on your smartphone's screen! Super addiction and entertainment is guaranteed!

Meet with Tomatoes, strawberries, Onions, Coconuts, Eggplants, Watermelons, Apples, Nuts and pumpkins. Use time Freeze to splat more and Fat Finger to crash all of them on your screen, but be aware to avoid Bombs...
The game speed is increasing as you reach higher levels, so share the pack of infinite ADDICTON and ENTERTAINAMENT

Prove that you are the one how has beaten all of fruits and vegs and find your name #1 listed in Game Centre; Challenge your friends and Millions through the globe!
Features added in the new version:

- New, colorful, fresh and soft design!
- Updated and more interesting gameplay!
- New objects to fight with fruits and vegs!
- Refreshed and needful store!
- Modified and integrated Game Centre!

If you want more info we would suggest not looking for it here; GET FRUIT SMASHER NOW AND SEE FURTHER IN GAME!

Please don’t forget to thank us with 5 stars which will make us more motivated!

Thank You & Good Luck!!!
